Detailed Description

CPuzzleNodeEditor.

Description: This class is responsible for editing nodes in the graph.

Limitations: None

bool CPuzzleNodeEditor::canvasContextEvent (  QContextMenuEvent *  e  ) 
 

CPuzzleNodeEditor::canvasContextEvent.

Description: This function handles context menu events. It spawns the context menu for nodes if the user clicks on a node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The context menu is executed if a node was clicked on.
Parameters:
e,: This is a pointer to the context menu event which triggered this function call.
Returns:
bool: Returns true if the event is used and false otherwise.
Limitations: None

void CPuzzleNodeEditor::heuristicDone (   )  [slot]
 

CPuzzleNodeEditor::heuristicDone.

Description: This function is called when the user finishs editing a node heuristic value. It hides the line edit and then updates the name of the node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The node's heuristic value is updated.
